turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: The dark side. The price you pay for all the fun you're having. You knew about it, of course. Didn't you?

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: He was a friend of mine. A good guy...great guy. It was my fault.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: That's what you get flight pay for.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Why? You act like you didn't know one day this would happen.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You knew it. You all do. It's part of it. Maybe the most important part.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Where are we? You know where we are. It's called the beach. It's where life first crawled up out of the sea. I come here sometimes... when I feel like crawling back in.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: You don't have to do this.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Do what, show you a good time?

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: I'm not good company. I should be alone.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I don't think so, but if that's what you want...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You look way out there. Out past the date line. West becomes East, all things change. You cross the line...today becomes yesterday...or tomorrow, I forget which.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Of course the line's just imaginary. You can cross it twenty times...nothing really changes.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Only when you're depressed. Then it passes.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Everything passes. Immutable law of the Universe.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: What do you do when you come here?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I sit. I think. I play games.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: It's strip reality, actually, like what the pilots always want to play.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Strip reality! How do you play that?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: It's like strip poker, only, without the bluffing.  One person says something and if the other one accepts that it's true, the one who says it, gets to take one item of clothing off.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: You're crazy.  That's a pretty silly game.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Not as silly as some. You know the silliest one? ...that we are gods. That we control events on the beach... that we can turn back time...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You say the truth.  Go ahead. Don't be afraid. You want to win the game, don'tcha?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: The big one. The one that's most on your mind.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: That wasn't fair. It was a question. Penalty round!

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You didn't mean it. You didn't think. You'd do anything to take it back.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: We'll say it together. On the count of three...One...two...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Long distance? I wouldn't do that to you. I'd at least talk to you.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: I didn't want to see you. I mean, I did...but I didn't..

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I know exactly what you mean.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I've got a gift just like you do. My gift is I just know what people mean, even if they can't say it. It helps when you're trying to communicate with fighter pilots. Like what you just said was "I'm embarrassed, I feel I've done something wrong, that I've failed, and I don't think I can live up to the expectations of a wonderful interesting, intelligent woman like yourself." That about it?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: And I'm gonna sneak off, and be by myself for awhile, like until I can think of a new career...hotel management or something...

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Big talk for someone who's never been shot off her computer.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Hey, I never said I was a fighter pilot...I never claimed to think it was fun to be shot off the end of a ship in a storm. I can find contentment in a good book. I don't have to roar by someone at Mach two with my hair on fire. Sometimes...I just get happy being with the right man.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I think I have... I could be wrong. I have been before. Just remember one thing. If you're not Top Gun, if you're not fighting jets, you're not gonna be able to act like a fighter pilot... You're gonna have to act like the rest of us. You're gonna have to master humility. For you guys, that's the toughest maneuver of all.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You got your F-14, you got Top Gun, you got your MiGs....You're our new Top Gun instructor...Now what?

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Oh...I'll think of something... What are you doing here?

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Sir. You are going to give me a warning, Sir!

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Sir. I was going Mach point one five.

turns.speaker: CHP
turns.text: One SIXTH the speed of sound!

turns.speaker: CHP
turns.text: Lieutenant... What do you... usually fly?

turns.speaker: CHP
turns.text: Lieutenant... Is there... a Russian attack?

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: No sir! But you have to be ready.

turns.speaker: CHP
turns.text: Outside of this gate... I...am Top Gun.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: I'LL LOCK ON THEM, COUGAR.  Gotcha covered, don't nobody move.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: ROGER, COUGAR.  Okay boys, pull out with your hands up and nobody'll get hurt.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: EVERYBODY'S GOT TO BE SOMEWHERE. ..NOW WE'RE RIGHT WITH YOU. YOU ARE INVERTED.  ROLL IT, COUGAR.

turns.speaker: COUGAR
turns.text: YOU BETTER NOT BE RAGGING ME... IF YOU'RE FLYING UPSIDE DOWN...

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: NO JOKE, COUGAR. ON THE LEVEL. EVEN I WOULDN'T DO THAT TO YOU.

turns.speaker: COUGAR
turns.text: I'M UPSIDE DOWN. I KNOW IT. I'M GONNA EJECT.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: I've got a six strobe.  I think he's locked on us.

turns.speaker: COUGAR
turns.text: It's a MiG 21. They don't have radar missiles!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Lordy!  Eyeball to Asshole. Hope nobody burps!

turns.speaker: COUGAR
turns.text: We're locked on MiG ONE. Why doesn't he disengage?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: These guys are getting on my nerves.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Hey, if it was easy, everybody would want to come up here and do it..... Instead of just us.

turns.speaker: COUGAR
turns.text: Help me with this one, I'm really screwed up.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Bring it left. Bring it left, You're high.

turns.speaker: COUGAR
turns.text: Can't you feel it? I'm hanging in my straps!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: You're not. We're level. Look at the instruments, we're okay!

turns.speaker: COUGAR
turns.text: They must be broken. I'm hanging in my straps! We're inverted!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: We're not! Trust me! We're okay.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: We're on vapor, Cougar, you got to put it down.

turns.speaker: COUGAR
turns.text: It's crazy, man. Instruments are crazy. We're gonna have to eject.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: TELL HIM, WILL YOU TELL HIM? OUR INSTRUMENTS ARE OKAY.

turns.speaker: COUGAR
turns.text: OKAY... OKAY. BUT IF I LAND THIS THING UPSIDE DOWN. AND I LIVE. I'LL HAVE YOUR BUTT!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: You'll have mine, Cougar. It'll be where your head used to be.

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: WHAT? WHERE'RE YOU--HEY, WHERE IN THE HELL ARE YOU GOING?

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: WHAT DO YOU MEAN? IT DOESN'T GET TO LOOK MUCH BETTER THAN THAT?

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: Since when did you care about paperwork?

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: If I could fly like you I'd have everything I want. If I could fly at all. I can't fly. I can't fly like that. Nobody can. Whatever it is, you've got it!

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: So, you're scared--so what? You ever get a good look at me in the back seat, I'm goddamn terrified.

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: Bandit at seven o'clock low--solo. Take him. Pull on the goddamn stick, man!

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: Don't tell me okay. Do it!

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: BREAK LEFT! BREAK LEFT!   CHAFF! FLARES!

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Goddamnit, Mav, you really are a slow learner. Don't worry, Fung, I've got it.

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: Don't WORRY!!!?   You've GOT it!!? Are you CRAZY?

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: Now have you got it?  Have you still got it?

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: What are you talking about, we gotta go!

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: 3,000 feet.  We gotta go, man. 3,000 feet, we gotta go!

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: You go. I'm staying with it.

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: Is there something I should know?

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Yeah, I guess it is. We did it! We did it...Damn! We sure did it!

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: Then...shit! Go ahead. I'm right behind you.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: MUSTANG, THIS IS MAVERICK, REQUEST A FLYBY.

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: You hear that? Anything we want. Anything...Well???

turns.speaker: FUNGUS
turns.text: Oh, no. You did the flying, I'll do the talking!

turns.speaker: GIRL
turns.text: Why do you all have such funny names?

turns.speaker: WOLFMAN
turns.text: You gotta have a call sign that's just your own...never changes...you have to recognize it immediately. Then, if someone shouts "Wolf, break left!"..you react right away.

turns.speaker: GIRL
turns.text: Why do they call you Wolf?

turns.speaker: WOLFMAN
turns.text: Well, I don't know. That depends.

turns.speaker: WOLFMAN
turns.text: Well, it doesn't just happen, you gotta do something famous.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: It's not Cougar's place. It's ours.

turns.speaker: ICE
turns.text: What do you think it was? Was it that MiG contact that did it?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: We're here because we're the best flyers in the wing. Not because of some MiG encounter.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: We won! Ice turns back, stares them down, then turns back into his locker, dismissing them.

turns.speaker: ICE
turns.text: Below the hard deck doesn't count. You guys are the second team, aren't you?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Slider -- they let you into Top Gun? If you're among the best in the Navy, I tremble for the security of this country.

turns.speaker: SLIDER
turns.text: Why Goose, whose butt did you kiss to get here?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: The list is long, but distinguished.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: You think you can stay up with us.

turns.speaker: SLIDER
turns.text: I think, yeah, we'll show you a thing or two.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: This is Evan Mitchell, he steers the thing.

turns.speaker: SLIDER
turns.text: So I heard. Steers it pretty close. Sorry to hear about Cougar. He was a good man.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Flaming Hooker. Sort of an institution around here. Or maybe this is the institution, I forget which. It's the house drink. It'll warm the cockles of your heart ... and other things depending on where you spill it.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Could use a dash more jet fuel.

turns.speaker: SLIDER
turns.text: Nice. Always a good idea to show up your instructors. He nods toward Jester, glaring at them from his A4. Goose indicates the backseat of the Tomcat.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Hey, see any controls back there?  And anyway...we beat the Son of a Bitch!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Look at the weather! They'll never find us! We're near out of fuel. Put it down.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Nothing...That's McGown...that's Singer, isn't it? GOOSE Turn around, pay attention. What are you doing?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Keller, Black Lion Squadron. I knew him at Pensacola. He's damn good.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Is there anybody in the Navy you don't know?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Gotta keep track of the competition.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Hey Mav, this is Sally. She doesn't believe a word I say. Tell her I'm married, will you?

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Yeah, he's married--but then again, he,s not dead.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: What do these guys think, I made Cougar quit?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Pay no attention to it. They're just trying to rattle you. It's all psychological. Sit down..and drink.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: I've lost him -- where is he?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: On your six -- coming hard. Four hundred. Losing airspeed! He's on your six and closing fast! Hard left! HARD LEFT!

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: He should've had me. GOOSE Take it down. Let's bug out of here. Call for a draw.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Look, Ma, top of the world!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Ahhh...A little high on the left, don't you think?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: I wouldn't call it victory.  It's more like...self immolation.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Hi...Hi there. How ya doing in there?  Mav... Ahhh...you know, at one point I did want a Navy career.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: You see all those guys with gold on their shoulders!!?... Oh, no, I think that was Johnson, Air Boss of the Kitty Hawk!

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Come on, we beat an instructor. How many times in your life do you get to do a victory roll?

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Just once, if they take your plane away.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Come on, I got over six bucks on the line.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Come on, come on! It's double or nothing.. We're talking twelve bucks American, here.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Don't chew it, you won't have it that long. Easier to clean the cockpit if it comes up in big chunks.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: STAY WITH HIM! TIGHTEN YOUR TURN!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Bogey at three o'clock high! Nose on!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Just cover Wood, Maverick. Mutual support, man!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Don't be greedy. Stay with Wood.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: What what are you doing? We're cover!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Relationships are a bitch, here. It's hard enough to concentrate ...under the pressure. Having a woman here is asking for it.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: I guess that's what I'm doing, then.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Where do you find the time? Where do you find the energy. It's tough enough to keep your mind on school. A woman here is a real pain in the...

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: Go ahead. I can't reach. 2000 feet!

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: No shit! That why they call him Ice?

turns.speaker: HOLLYWOOD
turns.text: Nope. It's the way he flies - Ice cold. No mistakes. Wears you down. After enough time, you just get bored and frustrated, you do something stupid, and he's got you.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Man, you guys gooned it. Your laser butts are scattered across KANSAS.

turns.speaker: HOLLYWOOD
turns.text: Come on. I died enough for one night.

turns.speaker: HOLLYWOOD
turns.text: I was a victim of circumstance.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: They should have warned you about that one.

turns.speaker: HOLLYWOOD
turns.text: She's kinky for flight suits--said that she'd never seen so many zippers--played with them all night. The noise alone kept me up.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: Don't worry. I'll talk to him.

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: He's the best you have. He's going Top Gun!

turns.speaker: STINGER
turns.text: Well, he's going  and he needs someone to fly the plane.

turns.speaker: STINGER
turns.text: I didn't do it, he did it himself. Something about a wife and kid. The fact is, he's lost it. He knows it. I know it. You were up there, you know it, too. GOOSE Give him a break, Skipper. It was raining snakes up there. He'll be alright, soon as all the gorillas go home...

turns.speaker: GOOSE
turns.text: But, Skipper, Cougar's been picked for Top Gun...He's the best of the best!

turns.speaker: STINGER
turns.text: Well, you'll just have to make do with him .

turns.speaker: STINGER
turns.text: He's a hell of a flyer. In fact, he's so damn good he might have been picked for Top Gun himself. Except for one thing.  He just can't seem to follow orders!

turns.speaker: HOLLYWOOD
turns.text: It's not the plaque. The winner can get assigned here as instructor. He gets to fight every day.

turns.speaker: HOLLYWOOD
turns.text: Thirty seconds. That's all it took to blow us out of the sky.

turns.speaker: WOLFMAN
turns.text: It's kind of ironic. All you guys have women troubles and I don't.

turns.speaker: HOLLYWOOD
turns.text: That's because you don't have any women.

turns.speaker: WOLFMAN
turns.text: Until last night. Did you see the moves I was making on that girl at the party?

turns.speaker: HOLLYWOOD
turns.text: The girl with the purple fingernails?

turns.speaker: WOLFMAN
turns.text: That's her--tall hungry woman with fire in her eyes. It was great.

turns.speaker: HOLLYWOOD
turns.text: Coogan spent half the night looking for her. He said he was gonna kill the son-of-a-bitch who ruined his sister.

turns.speaker: WOLFMAN
turns.text: I'VE GOT TWO MORE BOGEYS COMING IN AT FOUR O'CLOCK HIGH.

turns.speaker: MAVERICK
turns.text: COME OFF RIGHT--COME OFF HIGH--I'M IN--I'LL ENGAGE.

turns.speaker: ICE
turns.text: STAY WHERE YOU ARE. HE'S MINE. I'M ENGAGED. I'M IN.
